input.sentences: the ticket master was taking money .
output.sentences: It was game time at the baseball stadium.
The ticket seller loaded the cash box so she could make change for the fans who bought tickets when they arrived.
the parking lot was filled with vehicles and more than a few tail-gaters who loved their own food
Other fans bought their snacks from vendors in the hall.
The event staff was on hand to keep everyone safe and most fans appreciated them and followed the rules.
